bibl.title: Kandake, Meroe and India - India and the Alexander Romance.
Alexander the Great and Egypt. History, Art, Tradition. Wrocław / Breslau, 18. / 19. Nov. 2011.

bibl.note: Candace's episode. - Geographical setting of story in the Alexander Romance. - Candace's palace. - Description of other Indian palaces. - Porus' palace in Alexander's letter to Aristotle about India. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Aleksandra Szalc, Kandake, Meroe and India - India and the Alexander Romance.

Volker Grieb, Krzysztof Nawotka & Agnieszka Wojciechowska (edd.), Alexander the Great and Egypt. History, Art, Tradition. Wrocław / Breslau, 18. / 19. Nov. 2011 = Philippika. Altertumskundliche Abhandlungen. 74 (Wiesbaden, 2014) pp. 377-390.

Candace's episode. - Geographical setting of story in the Alexander Romance. - Candace's palace. - Description of other Indian palaces. - Porus' palace in Alexander's letter to Aristotle about India. - Conclusion.
